thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com
thread.title: Richard D Katalenic
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Richard D Katalenic

author: Richard D Katalenic
title: Richard D Katalenic
text: Very knowledgeable salesman Tony made it very easy to choose. He was the reason we decided on the leather sectional. We love it ! Answered all our questions and got us next day delivery ! Thank you again for a great experience. I would definitely recommend Gardner White and will be back when the need arises.
